explanation: [0-0] In a room with white walls, a man with an exaggerated expression is staring wide-eyed, holding blue handles in his hands and looking forward. He is wearing a red hoodie. On the left side, there is white text "Tik Tok @mercuri 88," with the "Tik Tok" logo above it and a yellow background with black text "Mercuri 88 Official Channel" below it.
[0-2] The man's hair is flying. The scene changes to a PlayStation on a table, shaking up and down. There is also a power strip plugged with wires on the table.
